reviews.review: Игра топ советую всем но проходить ее очень быстро
Очень хорошая и увлекательная игра-головоломка, крайне рекомендую познакомиться с ней!

This game is AMAZING. If you are stupid, (like me) Then you will have problems. For sure. I beat the game in 10 hours, might not seem like a lot of time, but there is someone who beat it in 1 hour. Back to the point. I  first played this on Xbox 360 when it came out, after beating portal 1 a few months prior. This game is STELLAR. One negative thing is it does have a few plot holes if you don't read the Rat Man comics. One question, where the fuck is portal 3, or maybe a free like 20 minute follow up  mini-game? At least give us a solid answer, valve.














































the cake is a lie

I really liked the story, Wheatley and GlaDOS are interesting characters, the puzzles are decently difficult, but the strength is the cooperative multiplayer, the workshop has really difficult and challenging maps, I assure you that you won't get bored, especially playing the cooperative ones, you will spend hours trapped with your friend on the same map because both of you got 5 IQ each
不愧是神作，有趣是真的，双人模式还能和好友联机，舒服
its an awesome puzzle with a great storyline

this game is really fun sometinnes :)) i think it is cool from the guns science world shooting shot shotes this game was pretty chalening but i beat it sometimes in a short times :0 imy favorite part is whne **SPOILER SLERT** when gladus becomes a tater LOL :))) the

Недавно поиграл в Portal 2 и решил поделиться своим мнением о игре. Игра сама по себе очень необычная, похожих на неё нет.
Цель игры проходить тестовые камеры т. е уровни, в которых нужно решать различные головоломки.
Главное оружие это пушка, коротая умеет создавать порталы. Всего может быть два портала - синий и оранжевый. Они связаны и между ними можно перемещаться самому и перемещать ящики, лазерные лучи. На этом и строится прохождение уровня.
В игре хорошая атмосфера. Всё время что-то происходит, много шуток в игре, вообще в игре можно хорошо повеселиться. Голоса за кадром вписываются в игру и делают её ещё более интересной.
От игры осталось хорошее впечатление, советую сыграть.
正在寻找联机伙伴...(怎么这么慢？！难道只能和同网的人玩？）

Portal 2 is one of the best puzzle games to date.

Portal 2 was created by Valve, a company which has created some of the best games like Half life, CSGO, TF2, gmod, etc, and stands with them all as some of the best computer games to date. Portal 2's puzzles, characters, and atmosphere make you need a Portal 3 but we sadly don't have one. Portal 2's characters (pretty much just chell, wheatly, and GLaDOS) are unique and they're often comedic. The puzzles, while confusing, are amazing and fun to play. And the atmosphere is amazing, set in Aperture science is amazing. The test chambers have a weird, creepy, loneliness atmosphere that makes the game enjoyable and but also makes it stand out. Besides from regular solo mode, there is a Co-Op mode too. The Co-Op is fun and amazing to play with a friend.

I would give portal a 91/100
I'm stuck on the menu screen. Help.
One of the best co-op games of all time, I wish more decent co-op games were still being made
forma creativa de resolver los problemas del juego
Very enjoyable game but don't play with a friend who trolls you all the time.

This is a great game.  From the concept to the script.  

Play this game... But play the first one first.
Great game! Same magical feel as the first one.  Good storytelling, fun puzzles and a fair bit of humor :)
magnum opus of comedy on Valves part.
It's Portal 2. What were you expecting?

Muy bueno, esta muy bien pensado el juego, el humor sarcástico en el modo campaña es genial, lo disfrute todo lo que duró. (Casi diez horas cagandome de risa). También se puede rejugar con el modo desafío donde nos vamos comparando con la comunidad en mejor tiempo y menor cantidad de portales en cada nivel. Otro modo  es el de "comentarios de los desarroladores", donde van explicando cada puzzle o situación de la partida en el momento de crear el juego y su lógica. 

El coop online por ahora lo jugué poco, pero esta muy bien, es un poco mas complejo que el single player, eso es un punto a favor y tiene bastante contenido por lo visto. 

Por otro lado esta el workshop donde hay muchos puzzles creados por la comunidad para tener mucho mas horas de juego. También podes crear tu propio puzzle de forma sencilla dentro del juego y compartirlo.

Si te gustan los puzzles solo o con un amigo es 100% recomendable. Se pone en juego la física en primera persona e interacción con muchos objetos.

Well, I love puzzle games. Portal 2, and also the original Portal utilises physics and portals to make some of the most challenging puzzles ever. I really love the puzzles, and the story-line as well.
Amazing story, voice acting, and puzzles. 100/10
i want to punch <}:( (Please tell me what you think of his hat)

mt bom historia bom mt bom
Me parece un juego muy ingenioso divertido y con una muy buena historia, acompañado con el 1 es de lo mejor

Este juego es realmente una de esas estrellas de las que no se ven mucho hoy en día... una estrella que además brillará durante toda la eternidad sin perder su luz. No hace falta nada mas que decir, una verdadera obra maestra.
Вершина творчества Valve. Интересные головоломки, которые можно решать с напарником или без (в зависимости от режима). И тонны чёрного юмора, генерируемого ГЛаДОС.

This game really did well everything about it was great i believe if you are looking to play a good puzzle game with an interesting story this is the game for you and even if you don't like puzzle games you still should still give this game a shot.
